statement.p: Initially, there were 630 mosquitos in a population, and it decreases by 9 every 5 days.

ul.li:
What will be the population at \displaystyle{t}={12} days? Round your answer to the nearest whole number.
Answer: Preview Question 1 Part 1 of 2

Write a formula for the population of mosquitos as a function of \displaystyle{t}.
Answer: \displaystyle{P}{\left({t}\right)}=Preview Question 1 Part 2 of 2
